title: Spacecraft-collected fluxgate magnetometer, Decimated TeleMetry High, DSL, GSE and GSM coordinates - V. Angelopoulos, U. Auster & K.H. Glassmeier and W. Baumjohann (UCB, TUBS and IWF respectively, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, U. Auster & K.H. Glassmeier and W. Baumjohann @ UCB, TUBS and IWF respectively, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: thd_fgm_fgs_quality
parameters.description: FGM-FGS Data Quality (0: Good data, 1:boom not deployed, 2:in shadow, 3:uncorrected shadow, 4:noisy waveforms)

parameters.name: thd_fgs_btotalQ
parameters.description: (Good data only) FGS magnetic field B magnitude. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_fgs_btotal', 'thd_fgm_fgs_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_fgs_gseQ
parameters.description: ---- FGS (spin-resolution/~3 sec) magnetic  field B in XYZ GSE Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_fgs_gse', 'thd_fgm_fgs_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_fgs_gsmQ
parameters.description: ---- FGS (spin-resolution/~3 sec) magnetic  field B in XYZ GSM Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_fgs_gsm', 'thd_fgm_fgs_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_fgs_dslQ
parameters.description: ---- FGS magnetic field B in DSL (Despun Spacecraft) Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_fgs_dsl', 'thd_fgm_fgs_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: BXYZ Despun Spacecraft Coordinate, nT units

parameters.name: thd_fgs_btotal
parameters.description: (All Qualities data) FGS magnetic field B magnitude

parameters.name: thd_fgs_gse
parameters.description: ---- FGS (spin-resolution/~3 sec) magnetic  field B in XYZ GSE Coordinates

parameters.name: thd_fgs_gsm
parameters.description: ---- FGS magnetic field B in XYZ GSM Coordinates

parameters.name: thd_fgs_dsl
parameters.description: ---- FGS magnetic field B in XYZ DSL (Despun Spacecraft) Coordinates
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: BXYZ Despun Spacecraft Coordinate, nT units
